name: Overlay
desc: A JSON object for a Snapshot URL that describes polyline overlay characteristics, including points for the overlay and styles such as width, color, and dash pattern.

items.name: points
items.desc:
An array of coordinates, specified as latitude and longitude coordinate pairs, or as a string encoded with the Encoded Polyline Algorithm Format.The array format specfies points for a polyline overlay. The following example specifies two points for a polyline overlay as an array of latitude and longitude coordinate pairs:
"points": ["37.779996,-122.51158","37.78040,-122.51348"]

You can provide those same parameters in encoded polyline algorithm format:
"points": "w{qeFj`wjVwAzJ"

items.name: strokeColor
items.desc: The color of the line between each coordinate point. Supported values are HTML color names or hexadecimal color codes.

items.name: lineWidth
items.desc: The width of the line, in CSS pixels.

items.name: lineDash
items.desc: An array that defines a line's dash pattern, where numbers represent line and gap lengths in CSS pixels. For example, [10,5] means draw a line for 10 pixels, leave a 5-pixel gap and repeat. An empty array draws a solid line, which is the default.
